DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_MyFace_03_01: Wait a minute! You look like a decent guy to me. Say, do I have something on my face?
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_MyFace_03_02: People look at me strangely, some laugh, but no one wants to tell me what's wrong!
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_MyFace_03_03: And I'm a little lost myself... The last thing I remember was drinking wine with a good friend of mine.
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_Friend_03_02: What? What did that bastard do?
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_ItIsOkey_15_03: Absolutely. You have nothing to worry about.
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_ItIsOkey_03_04: Thank gods... I'd better get some rest.
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_ThatWasAJoke_15: You have become the victim of a mean joke.
Your friend treated your hair and beard with a razor... To put it lightly, it shows some deficiencies.
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_ThatWasAJoke_03: Oh, shit! Let me just get this bastard!
DIA_PeculiarCitizen_NS55_After_03_01: Sorry, I have things to do.
